form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: IN DEPORTATION PROCEEDINGS UNDER SECTION 2 OF THE IMMIGRATION AND NATIONALITY ACT ORDER TO SHOW CAUSE and NOTICE OF HEARING

Y. (address) IT APPEARING, That you are in the United States in violation of law in that: 1. You are not a citizen or national of the United States; 2. You are a native of: Chine China and a national of ; 3. You last entered the United States at Boston, Mass. on April 30g 1955 ; 4. You were (date)ted as a nonimigrent, to wit: a crowman, authorised to remain in the U. S. in that status not to exceed 29 days. 5. You have remained in the United States thereafter without authority. and that you are subject to be taken into custody and deported pursuant to the following provision(s) of law: Sec. 241(a)(2) of the Insigration and Nationality Act, in that, after admission as a noninsigrant under Sec. 101(a)(15) of said High you sview not you have remined in the United States for longer time than permitted. bebasixe grom of Omebriegses (sigh) IT IS ORDERED, That you appear before a Special Inquiry Officer of the Immigration and Naturalization Service of the United States Department of Justice at new york my on Oct.2. 1956 at 9A. m. and show cause why you should not be deported from the United States on the charge(s) set forth above 919W epiton (sish) IMMIGRATION AND NATURALIZATION SERVICE Wilber 5.
